title: Impulsively
description: Quinn, a good girl with a past tortured by organized crime, determined to bring down the two biggest motorcycle clubs in Vegas...she never anticipated a complication like Brooks. The damaged bad boy, womanizer, and the newest member of the Dante’s Nine MC has set his sights on her and now it’s game over. She knows what’s at stake getting involved with an outlaw like Brooks, but giving up control and letting him take what he wants, even for just a moment, is worth losing everything. This is a standalone Contemporary Romance novel. No cliffhanger. Third book in the Dante’s Nine MC series. Content suitable for adults only, contains violence, and graphic sexual content.
author: Colleen Masters
